1101010000110101 1001011011110100 1 -> sum: 0110101100101010, cout: 1
1111000011011110 0111111100010110 1 -> sum: 0110111111110101, cout: 1
0000100110010101 0011001100010111 0 -> sum: 0011110010101100, cout: 0
1000110010110101 1100111011011111 0 -> sum: 0101101110010100, cout: 1
1010110100100111 1010111111011000 0 -> sum: 0101110011111111, cout: 1
0100100101110001 1100111110111100 0 -> sum: 0001100100101101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
